document_data.name: Healing Bug
document_data.mainbody: '''Healing bug''' were large edible [[insect]]s found in the jungles and [[vanilla]] groves of [[Malatra]].
document_data.Ecology: When eaten alive, healing bugs made a loud crunch and, if consumed completely - provided a small burst of ''[[Cure minor wounds|healing]]'' to the consumer.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], healing bugs were known to be gifted to goodly travelers by the lesser [[Nature spirit (Kara-Tur)|nature spirit]]s of Malatra [[Timon]] and [[Pumba]]. Each gifted boon was a small bag of weaved jungle leaves that contained six crunchy healing bugs.
